name: svg-scout
description: Chrome extension to scout and extract SVG icons from any webpage

scripts.build: bun run build:chrome && bun run build:firefox
scripts.package: bun run package:chrome && bun run package:firefox
scripts.package:chrome: bun run build:chrome && cd dist/chrome && zip -r ../svg-scout-chrome.zip . -x '.DS_Store' -x '*/.DS_Store'
scripts.package:firefox: bun run build:firefox && cd dist/firefox && zip -r ../svg-scout-firefox.xpi . -x '.DS_Store' -x '*/.DS_Store' && bun run lint:firefox
